book.synopsis: Kurt Vonnegut cites Theodore Sturgeon as the inspiration for his character Kilgore Trout. This volume includes 12 stories from 1953, considered Sturgeon"s golden era. Among them are such favorites as the title story,
book.title_long: A Saucer of Loneliness: Volume VII: The Complete Stories of Theodore Sturgeon
